p.s: The given text is an extract of a speech, Obama gave at the Culture and Arts Center of Mimar Sinan Fine Arts University in Tophane.
It deals with the importance of intercultural understanding and student exchanges.
In the following i'llI'll summarise his speech.
The speech is divided into three sections.
First Obama gives reasons why he came to Turkey.
He explains that he wants to found a relationship between the United States and the other people (l. 1-4).
In the following he mentions a few aspects which underpin his thesis of the importance of intercultural understanding and student exchanges (l. 5-12).
He says, that he'd like to level new ways to connect all around the globe and that experiencing the world beyond your borders is really supportive to get to know new cultures.
Furthermore, providing the energy and idealism makes effort possible.
In the last paragraph, he summons the readers to explore the different parts of the world and to cross your borders (l. 13-21).
